# Introduction
This document explores various questions proposed by GCP5 in their original hypothesis-generating
[Gdoc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FzXDDyk9h-pWg3O_epDkDZFXIX0Auyk_klfA0C8Ctdk/edit?usp=sharing). Sections are back-ended by various simulation runs that can be found in the `simulations` directory.
